content: a small stuffed bunny which resembles the shape of the easter marshmallow treats i ve been making these for years and i am so excited seeing others make them too as you ll see in the photos this pattern can be made using different yarns and hooks for different but still fairly small sizes i hope you enjoy this quick springtime make materials needed option 1 worsted weight 4 yarn 3 6 mm safety eyes 3 5 mm hook option 2 bulky weight 5 yarn 3 10mm safety eyes 5mm hook option 3 super bulky weight 6 yarn 3 12mm safety eyes 7mm hook darning needle poly-fil original pattern release 2018 uses option 1 materials as examples updated version 2024 uses option 2 materials as examples
